item.title: Report X-2023061535
item.description:
Report X-2023061535

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-21
  • City: GREENVILLE
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found at or around 1000 hours after dispatch. Package was taken to the QA cage for inspection, package appeared to be exposed to internal leakage. Package was placed inside of a plastic bin to contain leakage. DescribePack: One container inside the package appears to have spilled contents due to loose cap. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed inside of a plastic bin.

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: the package was placed on a table for inspection upon inspection the package had a hole and hazmat labels on it. the package was then moved to a QA area. DescribePack: the lids on the bottles were not tight and led to a leak. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: absorbent mats were placed down to clean and stop the spared of the leak.

  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The damaged package was placed in a hazardous materials tote and take to the hazardous materials staging area away from personnel and other packages. DescribePack: Upon inspection it noted that the plastic drum bottom has a small hole that causes it to leak. DurationRel: 6 and MitigateEffect: The damaged package was placed in a hazardous materials pail awaiting disposition.

item.title: Report X-2023061266
item.description:
Report X-2023061266

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-19T21:09:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-19
  • City: WILMINGTON
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Upon unloading the package from the trailer, the package handler noticed the package was upside down. Upon turning it right side up to scan the label, it began leaking. The package was placed in a red hazmat tote and QA was informed of its condition and location. DescribePack: The lid of one jug had become loose, and spilled out, soaking the bottom of the outer packaging. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed in a red hazmat tote and take to the nearest QA cage for further processing.

item.title: Report E-2023060695
item.description:
Report E-2023060695

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-18T15:09:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-25
  • City: CHARLOTTE
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal NCH experienced a UN3264 Bonderite M-ZN release from a 55-gallon poly drum. ERTS dispatched contractors to conduct cleanup operations. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 10-gallons of product released to 53' x 8' area of the trailer floor, a 15' x 15' area of the concrete dock, and a 2' x 1' area of the concrete lot below due to a forklift puncture. The damaged drum was placed into a 95-gallon poly overpack. Absorbents were deployed and worked into the impacted areas. All impacted absorbents were collected into (2) 55-gallon poly drums. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.

item.title: Report X-2023061232
item.description:
Report X-2023061232

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-18T15:09:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-15
  • City: CONCORD
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: BULK MANAGER FOUND THIS IN A TOTE UNDER THE BELT AT OUR TZO TRAILER. HE NOTICED THE TOP OF THE BOX WAS WET AND BROUGHT TO US FOR INSPECTION. AFTER INSPECTION WE NOTICED THE CAP ON ONE OF THE BOTTLES WAS LOOSE AND IT DID LEAK OUT ONTO BOTH BOTTLES IN THE PACKAGE. DescribePack: LOOSE CAP DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: WE MADE SURE TO ISOLATE THIS LEAKING PACKAGE INTO THE HAZMAT CAGE

item.title: Report X-2023061191
item.description:
Report X-2023061191

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-18T15:09:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-14
  • City: DURHAM
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The damaged package was placed in a hazardous materials tote and taken to the hazardous materials staging area away from personnel and other packages. DescribePack: Upon inspection it was noted that the cap on the plastic jug of ethanol was loose causing the contents to leak. The plastic jug of methanol was alright. Styrofoam and paper used for packaging. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The damaged package was placed in a hazardous materials drum awaiting disposition.

item.title: Report X-2023061181
item.description:
Report X-2023061181

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-18T15:09:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-13
  • City: CONCORD
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: BULK TRUCK MANAGER BROUGHT THIS OVER TO OUR ADMIN CAGE AND SAID THAT THE BOX WAS OPEN AND THE LID OF THE PLASTIC CONTAINER HAD SOME SOLID GRANUALS OF POWDER ON TOP AND THE SIDE. WE INPSECTED THIS AND IT LOOKS LIKE THE LID TO THE CONTAINER WASNT SEATED VERY WELL. IT WASNT COMPLETED CLOSED TIGHTLY AND A SMALL AMOUNT OF THE SOLID GRANUALS DID LEAK OUT INSIDE THE BOX AND DOWN THE SIDE OF THE PLASTIC CONTAINER. DescribePack: LOOSE LID DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: SEPARTED THIS PACKAGE TO THE HAZMAT CAGE IN A LINED HAZMAT TOTE.
